org.forgerock.openam.rest

Class Routers.VersionedResourceRoute

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.rest.Routers.VersionedResourceRoute
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Routers.VersionableResourceRoute
    Enclosing class:
    Routers

    public static final class Routers.VersionedResourceRoute
extends Object
implements Routers.VersionableResourceRoute
    A route that is being registered fluently, which requires versioning.
    Since:
    13.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • authorizeWith

        @SafeVarargs
public final Routers.VersionedResourceRoute authorizeWith(Class<? extends org.forgerock.authz.filter.crest.api.CrestAuthorizationModule>... authorizationModules)
        Specifies the authorization modules to use when authorizing requests to this version of the endpoint.

        Can only be set once, attempt to do so twice will result in an IllegalStateException.

        Parameters:
        authorizationModules - The authorization modules.
        Returns:
        This route.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If attempted to be set twice.

      • through

        @SafeVarargs
public final Routers.VersionedResourceRoute through(Class<? extends org.forgerock.json.resource.Filter>... filters)
        Specifies filters that the request must pass through before reaching this version of the endpoint.

        Can only be set once, attempt to do so twice will result in an IllegalStateException.

        Parameters:
        filters - The filters.
        Returns:
        This route.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If attempted to be set twice.
